forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.
